_package_info.description: Futuristic skills for space-faring civilizations including cybernetics, energy weapons, starship operations, and advanced technologies
_package_info.author: Storymaster

skills.name: Starship Piloting
skills.description: Operating spacecraft from small fighters to massive capital ships across interstellar distances

skills.name: Energy Weapons
skills.description: Mastery of plasma rifles, laser cannons, particle beams, and other directed-energy weapons

skills.name: Cybernetics Interface
skills.description: Direct neural connection to computer systems and cybernetic enhancement control

skills.name: Zero-G Combat
skills.description: Fighting in weightless environments using specialized tactics and equipment

skills.name: Quantum Computing
skills.description: Programming and operating quantum-based computer systems and AI networks

skills.name: Xenobiology
skills.description: Study and understanding of alien life forms, their physiology and behavior

skills.name: Psionics
skills.description: Mental powers including telepathy, telekinesis, and psychic manipulation

skills.name: Gravitational Engineering
skills.description: Manipulating gravity fields for propulsion, construction, and defensive systems

skills.name: Nano-Technology
skills.description: Design and deployment of microscopic machines for medical, construction, and combat uses

skills.name: Void Walking
skills.description: Survival and maneuvering in the vacuum of space using powered armor and thrusters

skills.name: Holographic Programming
skills.description: Creating and manipulating hard-light constructs and holographic environments

skills.name: Plasma Engineering
skills.description: Harnessing super-heated plasma for weapons, shields, and power generation

skills.name: Temporal Mechanics
skills.description: Understanding and manipulating time-related phenomena and chronoton particles

skills.name: Genetic Modification
skills.description: Altering DNA and genetic structures for enhancement, adaptation, and healing

skills.name: Artificial Intelligence
skills.description: Creating, programming, and interfacing with synthetic consciousness systems

skills.name: Dimensional Travel
skills.description: Navigation through alternate dimensions, parallel universes, and pocket realities

skills.name: Cryogenic Systems
skills.description: Operating suspended animation technology and ultra-low temperature equipment

skills.name: Stellar Cartography
skills.description: Mapping star systems, hyperspace routes, and navigating galactic territories

skills.name: Cybersecurity Warfare
skills.description: Digital combat including hacking, virus deployment, and electronic countermeasures

skills.name: Force Field Manipulation
skills.description: Generating and controlling energy barriers for defense and containment

skills.name: Terraforming
skills.description: Planetary engineering to make worlds habitable for specific species

skills.name: Mech Piloting
skills.description: Operating giant robotic suits and mechanical walkers in combat situations

skills.name: Exosuit Operations
skills.description: Using powered armor systems for enhanced strength, protection, and capabilities

skills.name: Alien Linguistics
skills.description: Learning and translating non-human languages and communication methods

skills.name: Fusion Reactor Control
skills.description: Operating nuclear fusion power systems and managing massive energy outputs

skills.name: Teleportation Technology
skills.description: Using matter transmission devices and instantaneous transportation systems

skills.name: Asteroid Mining
skills.description: Extracting resources from space rocks using specialized equipment and techniques

skills.name: Radiation Shielding
skills.description: Protecting against cosmic radiation, gamma bursts, and radioactive environments

skills.name: Cloning Technology
skills.description: Creating genetic duplicates and growing replacement organs or organisms

skills.name: Dark Matter Manipulation
skills.description: Harnessing exotic matter for faster-than-light travel and energy generation
